name: Vikram Goyal
content: IIIT-Delhi Skip to main content -A A A+ AA Vikram Goyal Vikram Goyal Professor (CSE) Ph.D. (2009), Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Delhi Contact Details 011-26907474 vikram@iiitd.ac.in Web Profile A-508 (R&D Block) Profile I am a faculty in IIIT-Delhi. I received my Ph.D. in Computer Science and Engineering from the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at IIT Delhi in 2009. Before pursuing Ph.D., I completed my M.Tech. in Information Systems from the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at NSIT Delhi in 2003. I have many publications in reputed conferences and referred journals. I have a couple of Projects from DST, India and Deity, India on problems related to Privacy in Location-based Services and Digitized Document Fraud Detection, respectively. Research Interests Data Mining, Databases, Spatial Data Analytics Teaching Interests Databases, Data Mining, Algorithms for Spatial Query Evaluation Affiliated Centres & Labs
